course.title: Behavioral Pharmacology
course.faculty_text: Jack Bergman (Medical School) and Brian D. Kangas (Medical School)
course.description: Introduction to behavioral pharmacology of CNS drugs (e.g., psychomotor stimulants, antischizophrenics, opioid analgesics, antianxiety agents); seminar format with emphasis on behavioral methodology (i.e., model and assay development) and pharmacological analysis (i.e., receptor selectivity and efficacy); attention to tolerance, drug dependence/addiction/treatment, and basic behavioral processes.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as BP 719.0.
